text: 213 (two hundred [and] thirteen) is the number following 212 and preceding 214. It is the smallest of a triple consecutive numbers that are products of two distinct prime numbers: 213 = 3 × 71, 214 = 2 × 107, and 215 = 5 × 43.. Its square is a sum of distinct factorials: 2132 = 45369 = 1! + 2! + 3! + 7! + 8!.. ==See also== * 213, a hip hop music group * Area code 213 * 213 Lilaea a main belt asteroid. * +213 is the code for international direct-dial phone calls to Algeria. ==References== Category:Integers ca:Nombre 210#Nombres del 211 al 219
title: 213 (number)
